Determine if a processing step should run

Source: R/workflow.R
should_run_step.Rd

Determine if a processing step should run

Usage

should_run_step(status, data_exists)

Arguments

status

Current status value for this step

data_exists

Logical or NULL. If logical, checks for desync (status="completed" but data missing). Pass NULL to skip desync check.

Value

logical - TRUE if step should run, FALSE to skip

On this page

Developed by Nathan C Layman.

list(text = “EcoExtract - Structured ecological data extraction from scientific literature”)
